name: Instincts
description:
You've been driving for hours and time is running out as night begins to fall.  In the back seat, a boy writhes in pain with every passing minute.  The city lights have faded and the woods grow thick and all that's left for you is to navigate a ritual aimed just as much to help the boy as to save you from a fate far worse.

Instincts is an atmospheric and interactive narrative experience.

You can control the ambient sounds by way of a collapsible side bar located to the left of your browser.  Instincts has been played in various popular browsers, but may fail to fully function in others.  It has been optimized for use in Firefox.

Feedback is always welcome.
